document_data.name: Malco
document_data.mainbody: '''Malco''' was the personal servant of [[Sozarro]] in [[1362 DR]].
document_data.History: Malco was a [[Payit (ethnicity)|Payit]] who believed Maztica conquered by the [[Amn]]ians in [[1361 DR]] and offered his services to them. He became the servant of the legionary Sozarro. Malco escaped with his master from [[Helmsport]] but did not know the whole truth about him.
document_data.Personality: Malco was so impressed by the magic and might showed by the [[Golden Legion]] that he believed the conquest inevitable. He believed that Sozarro had the potential for true greatness. He looked the other way whenever Sozarro acted illegally.
